text: in a specially in storage facility in
Washington suburb there's a
temperature-controlled room that looks
like a morgue but when you look under
the sheets you find hold space suits the
suits are the subject of an exhibition
starting this spring at museums around
the country because of their fragile
condition the exhibition will consist of
full-sized photographs and x-rays the
suits are in varied condition ranging
from practically pristine to old and
crumbly some were simply test suits and
some of them went to the moon the
collection of space suits dates from
1970s and earlier showing off nasa's
past as for the future with the
direction that nasa is taking uncertain
and funding unclear as well there hasn't
been much work on a new generation of
space suits
you
